text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Alexander a cloud support
engineer here at the AWS office in
Sydney today I'm going to show you how
to associate an aw certificate manager
SSL or TLS certificate with a classic
application or network low balancer
let's get
started first let's access the
certificate stores in aw certificate
manager after logging into the AWS
Management console navigate to the
certificate manager
console confirm that the certificate
status appears as issued now let's
associate an ACM SSL certificate with a
classic load balancer navigate to the
Amazon elastic compute Cloud console
select load balances in the navigation
panel select your classic load
balancer select the listeners tab select
the manage list listeners button click
add listeners button for listener
protocol choose https in the drop- down
menu for Port enter
443 for instance protocol choose HTTP in
the drop down menu for instance Port
enter 80 select edit under default
ssl/tls
certificate for the default T SSL SL ta
certificate choose from ACM in the drop-
down menu for the certificate select
your certificate from the drop- down
menu and then select save changes
button select save changes button on the
manage listeners page congratulations
you have successfully Associated a SSL
certificate with a classic load
balancer next we will look into the
steps to associate an ACM SSL ific with
an application load balancer select load
balancers in the navigation panel select
your application load
balancer select the listeners en rules
tab select the add listeners button
under protocol select https in the drop-
down menu and leave the port as the
default 443 under routing actions select
forward to Target groups option under
Target group select your application
load balancer Target group from the drop
down menu under default ssl/tls service
certificate select from ACM option
select your certificate from the drop-
down menu and select add button
congratulations you have successfully
Associated an SSL certificate with an
application load
balancer finally let's look into the
steps to associate an ACM SSL
certificate with a network load balancer
associate an ACM SSL certificate with a
network load balancer select load
balancers in the navigation panel select
your network load
balancer select the listeners tab select
the add listeners button under protocol
selects in the drop- down
menu and leave the port as the default
443 under default action choose forward
to your select Network CL balancer
Target group from the drop- down menu
forward default ssl/tls certificate
under certificate Source select from ACM
option under certificate from ACM select
your certificate from the drop down menu
and select add
button congratulations you have
successfully Associated an SSL
certificate with a network Lo balancer
so now you know how to associate an ACM
ssls certificate with a classic
application or network low
balancer thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
